scripts.build: pnpm run before-build && pnpm nx run-many -t build -p @docspace/client @docspace/login @docspace/doceditor @docspace/management @docspace/sdk
scripts.build:lite: pnpm run before-build && pnpm nx run-many -t build -p @docspace/client @docspace/login @docspace/doceditor
scripts.deploy: shx rm -rf ../publish/web && pnpm run before-build && pnpm nx run-many -t deploy -p @docspace/client @docspace/login @docspace/doceditor @docspace/management @docspace/sdk && shx cp -r public ../publish/web/ && node common/scripts/minify-common-locales.js
scripts.start: pnpm run before-build && pnpm nx run-many -t start -p @docspace/client @docspace/login @docspace/doceditor @docspace/management @docspace/sdk
scripts.start:lite: pnpm run before-build && pnpm nx run-many -t start -p @docspace/client @docspace/login @docspace/doceditor
scripts.start-prod: pnpm run before-build && pnpm nx run-many -t start-prod -p @docspace/client @docspace/login @docspace/doceditor @docspace/management @docspace/sdk
scripts.start-prod:lite: pnpm run before-build && pnpm nx run-many -t start-prod -p @docspace/client @docspace/login @docspace/doceditor
scripts.wipe: pnpm nx reset && shx rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml packages/**/node_modules
scripts.tsc: pnpm run before-build && pnpm nx run-many -t tsc @docspace/client @docspace/login @docspace/doceditor @docspace/management @docspace/sdk @docspace/shared
scripts.prepare: node -e "if (!process.env.CI) { try { require('child_process').execSync('git --version', {stdio: 'ignore'}); require('child_process').execSync('lefthook install', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } catch (e) { console.error('Lefthook installation skipped:', e.message); } }" && npm --prefix ./common/tests ci
